meanings.definition: A person who makes, repairs, or sells fur garments.
meanings.sent1: The furrier crafted a beautiful coat from the softest mink.
meanings.sent2: I need to take my fur coat to the furrier for some repairs.
meanings.sent3: The furrier joked that he was 'fur-ocious' when it came to his work.
meanings.sent4: Her skills as a furrier were as sharp as a tailor's needle.
meanings.sent5: The furrier's shop was filled with the luxurious scent of fur.

meanings.sent1: The rabbit's furrier coat kept him warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The bear's furrier paws allowed him to grip the slippery fish.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked even furrier after rolling around in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The forest seemed furrier after the first snowfall of the season.
meanings.sent5: The blanket felt furrier against her skin than anything she had ever touched.
